ja520:1.1: amataṃ padaṃ → amatapadaṃ (bj, pts-vp-pli1) | pamādo → mā mado (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1) | bharatūsabha → bhāradhūsabha (mr)
ja520:6.2: na hiraññaṃ na dhāniyaṃ → na hiraññanidhāniyā (mr)
ja520:14.2: Sohaṃ → yohaṃ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1) | maggasmi → maggosmi (pts-vp-pli1)
ja520:27.2: pasupālaṃ vihiṃsati → pasupālañca hiṃsati (bj); pasu phālaṃ vihiṃsati (sya1ed, sya2ed); pasu phālañca hiṃsati (pts-vp-pli1)
ja520:37.4: rājaṃ paramappamādaṃ → rājaṃ paramappavādaṃ (bj); rājaṃ paramappavādiṃ (sya1ed, sya2ed); rājā paramappavādiṃ (pts-vp-pli1)
